Valid Transclusion

This text is included in foo.txt.

This should not be transcluded to avoid an infinite loop – {{foo.txt}}

This text is included in bar.txt.

This can be transcluded without causing an infinite loop – This text is included in foo.txt inside the transclusion directory.

This should not be transcluded to avoid an infinite loop – {{foo.txt}}
